name: Metamorfight (loguntetley)
description:
Metamorfight was made for a four-day Westminster Game Jam in 2020, and most members first attempt at a local project made using Monogame. The theme of the competition was metamorphosis.

Metamorfight is a two-player local co-op game where you play as a doctor and monster. The doctor aims to cure those infected by the monster while the monster grows for each human fallen to its infection until it's too late.

The game features Unity's tilemap system, a top-down perspective, supply drop for monster and doctor giving them temporary abilities such as wall webs and cure drops from a plane. Each player has it's own progression gaining new abilities as it grows from traps to more lethal infections

Additional info

Developed on Unity 2019.3.31f
Supported platforms: Windows PCs
Player amount: Requires Two players
